title: David
text: I am a data scientist at NIH. Currently, I am studying the DNA methylation changes in blood samples of old populations. I am also interested in machine learning and data visualization.

text: I am a data scientist at NIH. Currently, I am studying the DNA methylation changes in blood samples of old populations. I am also interested in machine learning and data visualization.

title: David
text:

LEPS, National Institute on Aging | Staff Scientist | April 2020 - present
